Uses of Class
org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.exceptions.RestAuthResponseException

  • Packages that use RestAuthResponseException 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.callbackhandlers
    This package contains Callback handlers for converting Callbacks to and from JSON and completing a Callback from the contents of the Http headers and request objects.

    • Uses of RestAuthResponseException in org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.callbackhandlers

      Methods in org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.callbackhandlers that throw RestAuthResponseException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean RestAuthHttpCallbackHandler.updateCallbackFromRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, HttpCallback callback)
      Checks the request for the presence of a header with the Authorization Header as define in the HttpCallBack, if present and not an empty string then sets this on the Callback and returns true.
